title: Oven Temp: Inc. at an increasing rate?

The temperature, in degrees Celsius ( C), of an oven being heated is modeled by an increasing differentiable function H of time t, where t is measured in minutes. The table above gives the temperature as recorded every 4 minutes over a 16-minute period.
content.question: Are the data in the table consistent with or do they contradict the claim that the temperature of the oven is increasing at an increasing rate? Give a reason for your answer.

frqParts.text: Are the data in the table consistent with or do they contradict the claim that the temperature of the oven is increasing at an increasing rate? Give a reason for your answer.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point
